column5: Can anyone out there tell me the type of Highway 622 is out of Atikokan, leading north connecting to Highway 17? Is it paved or gravel? Is it hilly with alot of curves? What is the distance from Atikokan to Highway 17?Any information would be greatly appreciated and good fishing to all.Remember to keep your eyes open and your feet dry.S.v.m

It's a good paved road. Not much for shoulders. I take it to Finlayson / Camp 113, and from the Fort up to Dryden. Don't remember the milage offhand. If 502 is tied up with construction I would definatly take it.
BD,Thanks for the information, greatly appreciated. Good fishing and good luck to you this year.S.v.m
